name: Release azure-functions-java-library 3.0.0-SNAPSHOT
body:
## New

azure-functions-java-library v3 - Updating cosmos DB annotations to support [v4 extension bundle](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-functions/functions-bindings-cosmosdb-v2?tabs=in-process%2Cextensionv4&pivots=programming-language-java#cosmos-db-extension-4x-and-higher). https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-java-library/pull/188

azure-functions-java-library [v2](https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-java-library/tree/v2.x) - will continue to use the old annotations supporting v3 extension bundle.

name: Release azure-functions-java-library 2.0.1-SNAPSHOT
body: Add a new annotation [HasImplicitOutput](https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-java-library/blob/dev/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/functions/annotation/HasImplicitOutput.java) which support function return value if it's value is set to true (By default it's true).

name: Release azure-functions-java-library 2.0.0
body: Restructured azure-functions-java-library. Now, it only contains annotations related to triggers and bindings. The rest files can be find in [azure-functions-java-core-library](https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-java-core-library/releases/tag/1.0.0). This help to decouple between java library and java worker.

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.4.2-SNAPSHOT
Azure Functions Java Library 1.4.0-SNAPSHOT
Azure Functions Java Library 1.3.1-SNAPSHOT
body:
## Release Notes

- Added support for TraceContext on ExecutionContext.
- Added support to specify isSessionsEnabled on ServiceBusQueueTrigger and ServiceBusTopicTrigger annotations.

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.3.0
body:
## Release Notes
Releasing https://github.com/Azure/azure-functions-java-library/releases/tag/1.3.0-SNAPSHOT  to maven central

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT
Azure Functions Java Library 1.2.2
body:
## Release Notes

- Updated parent dependency to [java-8-parent](https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/releases/com/microsoft/maven/java-8-parent/8.0.0/)

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.2.0
body:
This release
- Added Parent POM
- Deleted unsupported MobileTable annotations
- Updated sample code in readme

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.0.0-beta-7-SNAPSHOT
Azure Functions Java Library 1.0.0-beta-6
body:
This release
- Added support to specify Cardinality on EventHubTrigger
- Delete [unsupported HttpTrigget attribute WebHookType](https://github.com/Azure/azure-webjobs-sdk-extensions/commit/d7c8d3155947f642eacd9d493dc8a99d52622754)

name: Azure Functions Java Library 1.0.0-beta-5
